sense.gloss: active, lively, energetic, vigorous, brisk, strong
height (e.g. of summer), peak (e.g. of cherry blossom season), (in) season, full bloom, full swing (of a party, etc.)
prime (of one's life), (one's) best days, bloom
to swell, to rise, to bulge, to be piled up
chilled soba served on a dish (often on a wicker basket or in a shallow steaming basket) with dipping sauce
lively, vigorous, energetic, healthy, avid (e.g. desire), rich (e.g. imagination)
full of (energy, appetite, curiosity, etc.), brimming with
many, varied, all sorts, crowded, large (e.g. helping)

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑好奇↑↓こうき↓↑心↑↓しん↓↑旺盛↑↓おうせい↓なのです。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑好奇↑↓こうき↓↑心↑↓しん↓が↑旺盛↑↓おうせい↓だね。
sdata.e: You are really full of curiosity, aren't you?

sdata.j: ↑観客↑↓かんきゃく↓は↑盛↑↓も↓り↑上↑↓あ↓がっているよ。
sdata.e: The audience is really charged up.

sdata.j: ↑会場↑↓かいじょう↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓であふれ、↑立錐↑↓りっすい↓の↑余地↑↓よち↓なしという↑大↑↓だい↓↑盛況↑↓せいきょう↓だったね。
sdata.e: The concert hall was so jam-packed there wasn't room to breathe.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑国↑↓くに↓ではウインタースポーツが↑盛↑↓さか↓んだ。
sdata.e: Winter sports are very popular in our country.

sdata.j: ↑花↑↓はな↓は↑今↑↓いま↓や↑真↑↓ま↓っ↑盛↑↓さか↓りです。
sdata.e: The flowers are at their best now.

sdata.j: ↑花↑↓はな↓はもう↑盛↑↓さか↓りをすぎている。
sdata.e: The flowers are already out of bloom.

sdata.j: ↑火山↑↓かざん↓↑活動↑↓かつどう↓で↑地面↑↓じめん↓が↑盛↑↓も↓り↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
sdata.e: The surface of the earth rose due to the volcanic activity.

sdata.j: ↑歌手↑↓かしゅ↓に↑向↑↓む↓かって↑盛↑↓さか↓んなアンコールが↑起↑↓お↓こった。
sdata.e: Everyone called out to the singer for an encore.

sdata.j: ↑下品↑↓げひん↓↑極↑↓きわ↓まる↑盛↑↓さか↓り↑場↑↓ば↓に↑通↑↓かよ↓いつける。

words.gloss: height (e.g. of summer), peak (e.g. of cherry blossom season), (in) season, full bloom, full swing (of a party, etc.)
